I think the sound of the gigant SRBs is somehow strange. You can clearly hear its looped, there is a very dominant sound of "speeding air" (i cant even describe it in my own language). Do you hear that, too?
"Rushing air" is the phrase you might be looking for.

Do really like using the KW, but seems it's not working properly now. Scrolled through half of the thread and found no resolution for shrouds problem. Proly, I've missed it. Could anyone point me to it?.

99% of the problems people have with fairings is because they installed the mod incorrectly. KWRocketry needs to be installed at the top level of your GameData folder in a folder named, "KWRocketry". Anything else will break things. Do not rename folders inside KWRocketry. It will break things.
There is a config in the Extras folder of the download that removes auto shrouds, its meant to be used for RO/RSS, but you might have installed it incorrectly.

Not used KW yet but wondered if it's going to be added to the CKAN?

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/100067-The-Comprehensive-Kerbal-Archive-Network-%28CKAN%29-Package-Manager-v1-5-0-24-Dec-2014/page37
It already is but won't show up as 0.90 compatible as it has not been noted as 0.90 compatible in the meta data. If you toggle to view incompatible mods you will see it there.

It already is but won't show up as 0.90 compatible as it has not been noted as 0.90 compatible in the meta data. If you toggle to view incompatible mods you will see it there.

ahh ok thank you
when we can get 0.90 version?
It's available in the OP. The 0.25 version works fine in 0.90, no need for an update.

when we can get 0.90 version?

It was literally answered on this very page. It's generally considered good conduct to read the last five pages or so before posting anything.

I need some help in using this mod efficiently:

1. Sometimes an engine appears to lower below the fuel tank - it still works but looks strange.

2. I'm not sure how to use the larger diametres correctly. I can't mount them sideways, the radial decouplers are not strong enough to hold larger parts and the KW Rocketry mod doesn't add extra radial decouplers? I wonder if e.g. the Thor Heavy Booster rockets are supposed to be a first stage? Whenever I try to mount them sideways they just tear the radial decoupler apart (I can't use more than one, it will always just connect to one decoupler which leads to unavoidable wobbling).

EDIT- Can you list your mods might ring a bell.

Mechjeb, Trajectories, ScienceAlert, VOID

Mechjeb, Trajectories, ScienceAlert, VOID

Thats the list lol this well lets see, I use MJ and Void there not it and Trajectories used to crash my game so try taking out ScienceAlert and see if that fixed it.
